spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly accurate to the 2D plan. Minor orientation error in the Entry door and slight compression in the Alfresco/Living connection.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are present and correctly adjacent. Wall thicknesses are consistent. A small hall wall near the Activity room is slightly shortened compared to the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement aligns well with intended functions. Scale is consistent throughout, though some minor decorative items in the kitchen (fridge/microwave block) are simplified.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent orthographic representation. Lighting is clear and helps define space. Geometry is clean with no visible artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Entry door swing and orientation appear inverted compared to the floor plan.
The Alfresco area couch is slightly oversized relative to the patio space shown in the 2D plan.
The kitchen island stools are placed on the wrong side of the island relative to the Dining/Living flow.
